data.partBlankContent: We didn't get a good feeling from the salesman at the used car dealership, so we're going to shop around some more. He w__ pushy a__ aggressive, and w__ prone t_ arguing. He couldn't let g_ of t__ idea th__ we sho___ buy a big, expensive veh____, ev__ after w_ had ma__ clear th__ we we__ looking f__ a sm___ efficient se___. data.fullContent: We didn't get a good feeling from the salesman at the used car dealership, so we're going to shop around some more. He was pushy and aggressive, and was prone to arguing. He couldn't let go of the idea that we should buy a big, expensive vehicle, even after we had made clear that we were looking for a small efficient sedan. At the end of the day, we were skeptical that he had our interests in mind.
data.answer: 我们从二手车经销店的售货员那里得到的感觉不太好，所以我们要去多逛逛。他爱出风头，咄咄逼人，而且容易吵架。他不能放弃我们应该买一辆大的、昂贵的汽车的想法，即使我们已经明确表示我们在寻找一辆小的、高效的轿车。最后，我们都怀疑他是否考虑到了我们的利益。
